column4: my gnome environment just stopped working for no apparent reason
i can still run in CLI but gnome just loads my background and then gives up
what happens when you load a failsafe gnome?
didn't think about that, one second
failsafe just kicked my back to my login manager
how about the Terminal option in the sessions menu?
I use kdm as my login manager, there is no terminal option
i'm using virtual consoles to access irc right now though
there is a failsafe option, which didn't work, no terminal option
oh i actually found a terminal option in another menu
and I have already restarted both kdm and gdm from terminal multiple times
can you use the terminal option?
all it did was send me over to the virtual consoles I'm already using
oh well, and I don't want you to restart kdm, stop it
